member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Infrastructure.Enums.SelectableState
member.summary: This enumerator describes the possible selection-states for the gaze-based selection state machine (or, potentially any other point-dwell selection state machine).

member.name: F:TalkingKeyboard.Infrastructure.Enums.SelectableState.Idle
member.summary: Awaiting for points to fall on control.

member.name: F:TalkingKeyboard.Infrastructure.Enums.SelectableState.SeenButWaiting
member.summary: A point has recently fallen on the control; waiting for a dead-time before animation begins.

member.name: F:TalkingKeyboard.Infrastructure.Enums.SelectableState.AnimationRunning
member.summary: The animation is currently running (i.e. selection is underway and the user is aware of it).

member.name: F:TalkingKeyboard.Infrastructure.Enums.SelectableState.AnimationOnHold
member.summary: The animation is on hold as the user looked elsewhere while selection was underway. The selection progress will be kept for a given amount of time.

member.name: F:TalkingKeyboard.Infrastructure.Enums.SelectableState.RecentlySelected
member.summary: The control has been recently selected and a dead-time is underway before returning to idle.
